message.content:
Subject: Notice of Resignation

Dear [Boss's Name],

I hope this message finds you well. I am writing to formally announce my resignation from [Company Name], effective [last working day, typically two weeks from the date of the email].

Over the years, I have greatly enjoyed and appreciated the opportunities I've had to grow both personally and professionally. Working with you and the team has been a truly rewarding experience that I will carry with me into my next venture.

However, after careful consideration, I have decided to pursue a new opportunity that aligns more closely with my long-term career goals. This decision was not made lightly, and I want to assure you that I am committed to making this transition as smooth as possible.

During my remaining time here, I will do everything possible to ensure a seamless transition. This includes completing all current projects and assisting in the training of a replacement if necessary.

I would like to express my deepest gratitude for your support and guidance during my tenure at [Company Name]. I have learned a great deal from you and am grateful for the opportunities I've had to develop my skills and contribute to the team.

Thank you again for everything. I look forward to staying in touch and hope that our paths cross again in the future.

Best regards,

[Your Name]
